text: The 1936 Manhattan Jaspers football team was an American football team that represented Manhattan College as an independent during the 1936 college football season. In its fifth season under head coach Chick Meehan, the team compiled a 6–4 record and outscored opponents by a total of 145 to 92. ==Schedule== ==References== Manhattan Category:Manhattan Jaspers football seasons Manhattan Jaspers football
title: 1936 Manhattan Jaspers football team
